name: Clicker Legends
description:
Hello guys! I am bringing you this time a free game!

The game is quick it has 15 stages and they are easily doable....
To beat the game you should take 5-6 minutes.

You heard it right!

The game can be completed in 5 minutes.
And thats why it`s free.


I wanted to bring something anyone can beat and help and encourage new players into rpgs.

I also wanted to create my first free Game.

This game is a Clicker RPG It plays like Clicker Heroes preety much.
There are no ads and game isnt pay to win.

Features

  • Levels
  • Items
  • Shop
  • 15 enemies
  • 15 Stages
  • Mouse Control
  • Cool sound effects
  • Easy to Learn and Master
  • No ads
  • Clciker RPG
